body: Before you say "oh leaving posts aren't allowed" I think I deserve this since I've been here since 2012. I'm leaving for a number of reasons I do not care to talk about out. I just want to say thanks to everyone here, especially kiwi, Sem,Ingigo,rot43 and many others who have been here with me on this amazing journey. It is sad that I won't see the year anniversary of avicus. That's all I really have too say. And before you ask yes my mojang account is gone so no one gets an alt :p
body_tagged: Before you say "oh leaving posts aren't allowed" I think I deserve this since I've been here since 2012. I'm leaving for a number of reasons I do not care to talk about out. It is sad that I won't see the year anniversary of avicus. That's all I really have too say. And before you ask yes my mojang account is gone so no one gets an alt :p
title: Well... I guess this is goodbye.

replies.body:
I don't want to be a buzzkill or anything but these posts are getting really spammy and they are hurting our reputation.

If new players come on forums and notice the number of these posts, they will turn away. Please, stop.

replies.body: Bye Joe! It's been fun PvPing with you. I know how much you want to improve and get better, and I hope you fulfill your dreams ;)

replies.body:
Just to clarify, permanent leaving posts are OK.
It's the temporary leaving posts that aren't allowed and will get locked.
replies.body_tagged:
Just to clarify, permanent leaving posts are OK.
It's the temporary leaving posts that aren't allowed and will get locked.

replies.body: It's fine if it's a meaningful leaving post meaning that you won't just come back after a week, you're really leaving. But cya man, I still remember some times with you in control the hill.
